LanguageData.Alien_SP.label: sheepawn
LanguageData.Alien_SP.description: A genetically engineered species of sheep people. They produce milk and a beautiful yet strong wool called "aries", which can be used to create the material known as "orion". Most individuals are fragile and rely on protection from others.
LanguageData.Alien_SP.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.Alien_SP.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.Alien_SP.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.Alien_SP.tools.3.label: headbutt
